name: WireBuzzer
description:
Wire buzzer is a free new Hyper casual Buzzer Wire game. It is a free-to-play game suitable for all ages that is unique in the market. The Wire
Buzzer game is aimed to challenge your patience, focus patience, and hand to eye coordination and you patiently navigate the ring through different unique obstacles. You would feel like life challenge because when the ring touches the bar you would fail the game. The Wire Buzzer game is designed for you to enjoy and
have a stress relief free game experience.
Wire Buzzer free Hyper casual game brings one of the most popular
tabletop wire buzzer amusement games to your mobile device. So you can
play this game anywhere and anytime for Free. It is suitable for all ages
and requires focus and great hand-to-eye coordination.
Each free level contains challenging gameplay. Keep playing this free
unique Hyper casual Buzzer Wire game to unlock new rings and character
skins.
How to play:
1. Tilt device left or right to rotate the ring
2. Use the joystick Up or Down to move the ring forward and
backward.
3. Complete the level by making sure the ring does not touch the
obstacle and you reach the top.
4. Be patient and work your way around each level of the game to
unlock more skins and rings.
Each free level contains challenging gameplay. Keep playing this free
unique Hyper casual Buzzer Wire game to unlock new rings and character
skins.
